name: Bus Driver: Pocket Edition
storyline: Over 35 routes to drive day and night, in different weather conditions and settings from city to suburbs to countryside. Test your ability to avoid parked cars, motorists, cyclists, pedestrians and unforeseen obstacles en route as you transport passengers from pick up to destination safely and on time. Your passengers are counting on you! Missions include a variety of objectives and time-based challenges of differing difficulty levels so dedicated and casual players of all ages will have a great ride.
summary: Take the wheel of 12 different buses all modeled from real-world vehicles such as the American school bus or London's double-decker buses for a realistic driving experience. An optimized interface and controls include all-new tilt steering and trackpad steering for easier handling and more intuitive play.
